description: Alert box information title to tell the user they must complete additional fields to unlock this area
Alert box information content to tell the user they must complete additional fields to unlock this area
defaultMessage: Add a claim above in order to access the fact-check for this item

description: Title of the media fact-check section.
Caption that informs that a fact-check is being saved
Caption that informs who last saved this fact-check and when it happened.
Placeholder instructions for fact-check title field
Caption that informs that a fact-check could not be saved and that the title field has to be filled
Placeholder instructions for fact-check summary field
Caption that informs that a fact-check could not be saved and that the summary field has to be filled
Placeholder instructions for fact-check URL field
defaultMessage: Add a URL to this fact-check article

description: A label on a button that opens the report for this item. This displays if the report for this media item is currently in the 'Published' state.
A label on a button that opens the report for this item. This displays if the report for this media item is NOT currently in the 'Published' state.
